IX.iii.2.C.2.a
.
Applicability of a Veteran’s Exercise of Right of Election
An election by a Veteran or on a Veteran’s behalf under
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 1.A.2
, is binding on his/her dependents, including an estranged spouse or children not in his/her custody.
If an election is received, defer award action if
the monthly rate of current-law pension would be less than the current monthly rate under the prior law, or
the election is not otherwise in the Veteran’s financial interest.
Reference
:  For more information on the action to take when an election is not in a claimant’s best interest, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 2.C.2.b
.
